content: maine cables hat © 2019 heather anderson after my niece showed me a picture of a cabled hat in a maine gift store a request soon followed it turns out that the hat my niece spotted was madunaier s happy husband hat that s the original this hat knits up quickly and is fully written and charted the pattern is written for the small size with changes for the large size in parentheses finished size 18 20 / 46 cm 51 cm circumference the hat is very stretchy my 23 58 cm head can wear either hat the small size fits snugly and the larger size is a looser fit the larger size should quite easily fit a man s head pink hat shown above is the large size materials worsted weight yarn approx 175 210 yds 160 192 m total us size 7 4 5 mm 16 41 cm needle or size needed to obtain gauge
